title: NYX Doll Eye Mascara, Extreme Black,  Volume,  DE02, 0.28 oz
description: Hello doll-face! For irresistibly fluttery eyelashes, try this mascara on for size. Doll eye mascara uses a unique blend of natural oils, vitamin E and nylon fibers to extend eyelashes to almost faux proportions. This mascara will add the volume in your lashes that you desire.

title: Eltamd UV Clear SPF 46, 48-Gram 1.7 oz.
description: Elta MD UV Shield 46 helps reduce the appearance of blemishes, discoloration, and photo-damaged skin while protecting from broad spectrum of UVA/UVB rays. UV Shield is lightweight and contributes to maintaining clean, clear, smooth skin. This product is great for all skin types, including acne-prone skin and also oil-free, paraben-free, non-comedogenic, sensitivity-free, and fragrance-free.UV Clear is formulated with 5% pure form Niacinamide, which is a part of the family of Vitamin B3 or niacine without the same toxic effects. The purer form used in this product has less or no nicotinic acid which can cause flushing or irritation and is also odorless.

title: The Naked Bee Naked Bee Hand & Body Lotion 6.7 oz lotion - Orange Blossom Honey
description: 6.7 oz 70% organic skin conditioning lotion and moisturizer for hand and body.

title: Pearl Enterprises M.T. ROLLER 1.0mm Micro Needle Roller Skin Care Therapy Dermatology System (Dermaroller)
description: The Microneedle works for various skin issues to make you look younger, more vibrant and with a healthy glow.  Best of all, it can be used almost on the entire body.  It rids stretch marks, cellulite, wrinkles, acne and promotes hair re-growth.

title: EO Everyon Soap Coconut and Lemon, 32 Ounce
description: A natural plant based soap made with pure essential oils. Gentle, fragrant, a perfect shower, bath and shampoo for the whole family.

title: Skin2Spirit Caffeine Eye Whip 1oz
description: NEW! Before and after picture from a real customer, unsolicited! (See pictures for details.) Finally, an ALL natural, whipped eye cream made with CERTIFIED ORGANIC ingredients! Comes in an AIRLESS BOTTLE with no straw that uses a vacuum system to get every last drop of cream out! Made with Organic Aloe as the main ingredient, and includes Caffeine Extract, known for increasing circulation, thereby helping to de-puff and lighten under-eye circles. This moisture rich eye whip also includes NaturLines, a natural ingredient that creates a SKIN RELAXING EFFECT! NaturLines is an anise extract rich in mineral salts, and reduces the phenomena of microtensing and visibly smoothes expression lines. In addition, Green Tea extract is a powerful antioxidant and helps reduce puffiness, Rose Hip Seed & Coconut oils provide even more moisturizing properties! Finally, Hyaluronic Acid is known as the most effective moisturizer ever discovered and helps to lock in moisture. Naturally, lightly scented with Organic, Wild Crafted Vanilla Bean & Coffee extracts, this whipped, hydrating, under eye cream is a treat for your eyes! (Unscented IS available for extra sensitive skin or noses, please see listing for Unscented)....Net Weight 1 oz. What are you feeding YOUR skin? PLEASE NOTE: Effective in 98% of cases, might not work for all skin types and all skin / health conditions that cause dark circles or puffiness. Please allow from 4-12 weeks to see results. Contact me if you have any questions or concerns! I am committed to your satisfaction!

title: Argan Oil for Hair and Skin by Poppy Austin®
description: Are you ready to be flooded with compliments?Have hair and skin to be proud of. In less than a week!Everyone's talking about Poppy Austin Argan Oil, and for good reason.Not only does it soften and hydrate your hair, as well as leaving your skin silky smooth, it's also packed full of fatty acids making it one of nature's most effective anti-aging moisturizers.Such is the interest in this naturally produced lightweight oil, celebrities such as Eva Mendes and Marian Cotillard (to name just a few) are describing Argan Oil as their daily skin and haircare "secret".WARNING: not all Argan Oils are the sameSadly, with Argan Oil's growing popularity, more and more companies are jumping on the bandwagon, using the Oil's name to launch sub-standard cosmetics. Most of these oils are completely fake, diluted or over processed in a lab. They contain just a tiny proportion of Argan Oil (often less than 5%), the rest of the bottle being made up synthetic filler ingredients and nasty chemicals.Poppy Austin Argan Oil GoldThe process of producing raw, organic, and 100% pure Argan Oil takes time. It is a manual system that has been carefully refined over centuries by the Berber women of Morocco. It is this exact process that produces each and every bottle of Poppy Austin Argan Oil Gold, deep in the heart of rural Morocco.This is our Grade A purity batch. Harvested & hand made: April 2014.Only 500 bottles are available at the discounted price shown each month, so click the Add to Cart button to secure your bottle of Poppy Austin Argan Oil Gold TODAY!
